overview: Sylvia, a novice schoolteacher, is hired to teach English in a high school, but sheâ€™s met with an apathetic faculty, a delinquent student body and an administration that drowns its staff in paperwork. The following days go from bad to worse as Sylvia struggles to reach her most troubled students.
tagline: Simple words that start a war: "Good morning. My name is Miss Barrett. I am your Home Room teacher..."
title: Up the Down Staircase
